long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of losing track of your favourite websites? This extension is here to improve the way you manage your bookmarks. With a sleek and customizable interface, you can effortlessly organize and find your bookmarks in no time.


Key Features:

Overlay of Chrome Bookmarks Manager: Automatically detects your Chrome bookmarks and allows you to add customizable descriptions, categories, tags, and colors for an easier search.

Quick Search: Instantly locate bookmarks by typing keywords and searching for their title or their assigned tags .

Usage Tracking: Discover which bookmarks you use the most with the appâ€™s feature that records how often each bookmark is accessed.

Folder-Specific Search: Restrict your search to specific folders, making it easier to find what you need within a designated area.

Customizable Interface: Personalize the look and feel of the application to match your preferences.


Say goodbye to bookmark chaos and hello to a more organized browsing experience!
